endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all reservations with their details.
Create a new reservation for a guest based on their preferences.
Update an existing reservation identified by its unique ID.
Cancel a reservation by its unique ID.
Retrieve a list of all rooms with their current availability status and details.
Fetch details of a specific room by its unique ID.
Add a new room to the system with all required details.
Modify the details of an existing room identified by its unique ID.
Retrieve saved preferences of a guest based on their unique ID.
Update or save preferences for a guest identified by their unique ID.
